Economic Resilience.name: Economic Resilience
Economic Resilience.description: A resilient economy (in terms of growth in economic output per capita) over the course of the business cycle, which sustains growth whilst reducing vulnerability to shocks.

Gender-Based Violence.name: Gender Based Violence
Gender-Based Violence.description: The primary outcome of gender equality is to eliminate all forms of gender-based violence (GBV), particularly intimate partner violence (IPV). The desired results include prevention through norms and behavioral change, integrated survivor-centered support, accountability and behavior change for perpetrators, and financial support to combat GBV.

Education.name: Education
Education.description: Universal quality basic education for all, which provides functional numeracy and literacy of all learners as measured by learning assessments.

Universal Healthcare.name: Universal Healthcare
Universal Healthcare.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages (Sustainable Development Goal 3).

The Energy Transition.name: The Energy Transition
The Energy Transition.description: A transition to a low-carbon energy system that is affordable, reliable, and sustainable, with universal access to electricity and clean cooking solutions.
